TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXmlSerializable

summary.span: 為 XML 序列化和還原序列化提供自訂格式。

span.span: Provides custom formatting for XML serialization and deserialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有兩個原因，若要實作這個介面。There are two reasons to implement this interface. 第一個是控制如何將物件序列化或還原序列化。The first is to control how your object is serialized or deserialized by the . 比方說，您可以資料分成而非緩衝處理大型資料集，位元組區塊，並也避免資料進行編碼使用 Base64 編碼方式時，就會發生擴大。For example, you can chunk data into bytes instead of buffering large data sets, and also avoid the inflation that occurs when the data is encoded using Base64 encoding. 若要控制序列化，實作並方法來控制和類別用來讀取和寫入 XML。To control the serialization, implement the and methods to control the and classes used to read and write the XML. 這個範例，請參閱[如何： 區塊序列化資料](~/docs/standard/serialization/how-to-chunk-serialized-data.md)。For an example of this, see [How to: Chunk Serialized Data](~/docs/standard/serialization/how-to-chunk-serialized-data.md). 第二個原因是要能夠控制的結構描述。The second reason is to be able to control the schema. 若要啟用此功能，您必須套用設為可序列化類型，並指定傳回的結構描述之靜態成員的名稱。To enable this, you must apply the to the serializable type, and specify the name of the static member that returns the schema. 請參閱的範例。See the for an example. 實作介面的類別必須具有無參數建構函式。A class that implements the interface must have a parameterless constructor. 這是需求類別。This is a requirement of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作序列化的私用欄位的介面。The following example code shows an implementation of the interface that serializes a private field. [!code-cpp[XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable/CPP/person.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable/CS/person.cs#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema GetSchema() cil managed

summary.span: 這個方法已保留且不應使用。

span.span: This method is reserved and should not be used.

summary.span: 實作 介面時，您應該從這個方法傳回 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )，而且如果需要指定自訂結構描述，請改為將 套用至類別。

span.span: When implementing the interface, you should return ( in Visual Basic) from this method, and instead, if specifying a custom schema is required, apply the to the class.

returns.span: ，描述物件的 XML 表示，該物件由 方法產生，由 方法取用。

span.span: An that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the method and consumed by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當序列化或還原序列化物件，類別不會執行 XML 驗證。When serializing or deserializing an object, the class does not perform XML validation. 基於這個理由，通常很放心地省略結構描述資訊提供一般的實作，這個方法，例如藉由傳回`null`(`Nothing` Visual Basic 中)。For this reason, it is often safe to omit schema information by providing a trivial implementation of this method, for example by returning `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 如果提供的結構描述資訊是必要的您應該使用屬性。If providing schema information is necessary, you should use the attribute. `GetSchema`方法應該仍會傳回`null`(或`Nothing`)。The `GetSchema` method should still return `null` (or `Nothing`). 有些[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]類型，以及舊版實作的自訂型別`IXmlSerializable`可能會使用介面`GetSchema`而不是`XmlSchemaProvider`。Some [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] types as well as legacy custom types implementing the `IXmlSerializable` interface may be using `GetSchema` instead of `XmlSchemaProvider`. 在此情況下，方法會傳回正確的 XML 結構描述，描述所產生之物件的 XML 表示方法。In this case, the method returns an accurate XML schema that describes the XML representation of the object generated by the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReadXml(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader) cil managed

param.name: reader
param.span: 還原序列化物件的 資料流。

span.span: The stream from which the object is deserialized.

summary.span: 從物件的 XML 表示產生該物件。

span.span: Generates an object from its XML representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法必須重新建構您的物件使用的資訊來寫入方法。The method must reconstitute your object using the information that was written by the method. 呼叫這個方法時，讀取器定位於包裝您的型別資訊的開始標記上。When this method is called, the reader is positioned on the start tag that wraps the information for your type. 也就是直接在開始標記上，表示已序列化物件的開頭。That is, directly on the start tag that indicates the beginning of a serialized object. 當這個方法傳回時，它必須擁有讀取整個項目從開始到結束，包括其所有內容。When this method returns, it must have read the entire element from beginning to end, including all of its contents. 不同於方法，此架構不會自動處理的包裝函式項目。Unlike the method, the framework does not handle the wrapper element automatically. 您的實作必須這麼做。Your implementation must do so. 無法看到這些位置的規則可能會導致意外發生執行階段例外狀況或損毀的資料產生的程式碼。Failing to observe these positioning rules may cause code to generate unexpected runtime exceptions or corrupt data. 在實作這個方法時，您應該考慮可能的惡意使用者可能會提供格式正確，但不正確的 XML 表示，若要停用或變更您的應用程式的行為，則。When implementing this method, you should consider the possibility that a malicious user might provide a well-formed but invalid XML representation in order to disable or otherwise alter the behavior of your application. ## Examples 下列範例說明實作方法。The following example illustrates an implementation of the method. [!code-cpp[XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable/CPP/person.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable/CS/person.cs#2)] 下列範例示範如何將還原序列化此物件的類別。The following example illustrates the use of the class to deserialize this object. [!code-cpp[XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable/CPP/reader.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable/CS/reader.cs#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void WriteXml(class System.Xml.XmlWriter writer) cil managed

param.name: writer
param.span: 序列化物件的目標 資料流。

span.span: The stream to which the object is serialized.

summary.span: 將物件轉換成其 XML 表示。

span.span: Converts an object into its XML representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您提供的實作應該寫出物件的 XML 表示法。The implementation you provide should write out the XML representation of the object. 架構會寫入包裝函式項目，並放置在其開始之後的 XML 寫入器。The framework writes a wrapper element and positions the XML writer after its start. 您的實作可能會寫入其內容，包括子項目。Your implementation may write its contents, including child elements. Framework 便會關閉包裝函式項目。The framework then closes the wrapper element. 將足夠的資訊寫入允許的資料流以重新構成您物件的方法。Write sufficient information to the stream to allow the method to reconstitute your object. 比方說，如果您的物件狀態包含陣列變數，務必撰寫陣列的長度，或使用父項目包含描述陣列值的項目，好讓您知道要讀取時重新組成物件的多少值。For example, if your object state includes an array variable, be sure to write the length of the array, or use a parent element to contain the elements that describe the array values, so that you know how many values to read when the object is reconstituted. ## Examples 下列範例說明實作方法。The following example illustrates an implementation of the method. [!code-cpp[XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable/CPP/person.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable/CS/person.cs#1)] 下列範例示範如何將還原序列化此物件的類別。The following example illustrates the use of the class to deserialize this object. [!code-cpp[XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable/CPP/writer.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerialization_IXmlSerializable/CS/writer.cs#10)]
